title: Which is the most underrated song sung by Arijit Singh? - Quora

response.answer_text: The answers previously written cover a lot a songs which are Arijit’s underrated but they share a common thing…..what’s that any guesses ???songs mentioned are mostly love songs The song which is actually underrated in terms of commercial penetration (as the movie was a commercial hit but i think the biggest of biggest Arijit’s fan would have missed on keeping this song in their favorite’s list)emotional stereotyping (as this songs does not belong to the cliched class of emotion which’s love and therefore is also underrated in terms of emotional value of the song)is ………..Ashq na ho (Holiday)  PS: The loveliest song sung by Arijit uptil here. Kudos to Irshad Kamil the lyricist of this wonderful song. SALUTE TO THE DEFENSE PERSONNEL _/\_

Arijit Singh has sung a lot of songs in the past few years. So, it is natural that some of his songs go unnoticed. Most of the time, his songs from low budget movies go in silence. But sometimes, songs from big budget movies also go unnoticed because of some other more famous song from that same album. I think the following songs are much better than the recognition they received. Main Dhoondane Ko Zamane Me[1] - Heartless.Laal Ishq[2] - Raam LeelaGulon Mein Rang Bhare[3] - HaiderMilne Hai Mujhse Aayi[4] - Aashiqui 2Beparwah[5] - ShahidNindiya[6] - SarbjitKhwaishein[7] - Calender GirlsFootnotes[1] "Arijit Singh" Heartless Song Main Dhoondne Ko Zamaane Mein Song With Lyrics[2] Laal Ishq | Full Audio Song | Goliyon Ki Raasleela Ram-leela[3] Gulon Mein Rang Bhare | Arijit Singh | Haider | Vishal Bhardwaj[4] "Milne Hai Mujhse Aayi" Aashiqui 2 Full Song with Lyrics | Aditya Roy Kapur, Shraddha Kapoor[5] Beparwah I Full Song I Shahid[6] Arijit Singh : NINDIYA Full Song | SARBJIT | Aishwarya Rai Bachchan, Randeep Hooda, Richa Chadda[7] Calendar Girls: Khwaishein (Rock Version) FULL VIDEO Song | Arijit Singh, Armaan Malik | T-Series
